text:
*Sorry updates to the extension have been a little slow* lately(going to inbound and heavy workload has limited my ability to put time towards it)

*Planning to get back to it this weekend* working on some of the features we currently have in beta, as well as a few new things some of you have asked for and things that were inspired by things said to me at inbound.

*If other devs are interested in contributing we can add you, otherwise you can fork and submit a pull-request.*  *We do have some areas where we could use help* we have some bugs we could use help squashing, we have a big new feature that <@U7ADCU3BM> has been kicking butt with, but our biggest issue bringing it to everyone is that we want to handle browser permissions the right way, the secure way. Itâ€™s basically all javascript and Google has documentation online for it.
